arcade.vis

Class Drawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.Drawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PottsDrawer

    public abstract class Drawer
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
    Visualization for simulation objects.

    Drawer objects convert Potts, Grid, and Lattice objects into MASON Portrayals, which can then be displayed.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Drawer

        Drawer(Panel panel,
       java.lang.String name,
       int length,
       int width,
       int height,
       sim.util.gui.ColorMap map,
       java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
        Creates a Drawer and attaches it to the panel.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
        name - the name of the drawer
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        height - the height of array (z direction)
        map - the color map for the array
        bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel
